Package samples.CheckingMouse

Interface Summary
EditingCheckingGraphMousePlugin.EdgeChecker<V,E> Use with EditingCheckingGraphMousePlugin to allow checking of an edge prior to graph addition.
EditingCheckingGraphMousePlugin.VertexChecker<V,E> Use with EditingCheckingGraphMousePlugin to allow checking of an vertex prior to graph addition.
 

Class Summary
EditingCheckingGraphMousePlugin<V,E> A plugin that can create vertices, undirected edges, and directed edges using mouse gestures.
EditingCheckingGraphViewer  
EditingModalGraphMouse2<V,E> I had trouble adding my new EditingPlugin to the existing EditingModalGraphMouse so I came up with this as a work around.
